title: 🚀 Welcome to the SalesAutoMate™ Blog
author: Rajdeep Chatterjee
content: Welcome to our official blog! Here you’ll find all the latest updates, tutorials, and insights into how SalesAutoMate™ is transforming business automation.

title: 📄 New Feature: Online Document Editor Launched

content: We’ve launched a Google Docs–like platform under docs.salesautomate.site – create, edit, and export documents easily without any backend setup!

title: 🔍 Behind the Tool: How the Email Finder Works
author: Rajdeep Chatterjee
content: Ever wondered how our Email Finder scrapes and validates emails with accuracy? We break down the logic and tech powering it.

title: 🧩 JSON Indexer - Organize Data Like Never Before
author: Rajdeep Chatterjee
content: Our JSON Indexer helps you categorize, structure, and extract key-value pairs from massive JSON datasets instantly. Built to assist developers, analysts, and marketers.

title: 📦 StockMate - Inventory Automation at Your Fingertips
author: Rajdeep Chatterjee
content: StockMate automates stock entries, generates alerts, and helps you manage your inventory digitally in the easiest possible way.

title: 🧾 Quotation Generator - Professional Bills in Seconds
author: Rajdeep Chatterjee
content: Create professional quotations and invoices using our simple CLI or GUI tool that exports clean, well-formatted PDFs instantly.

title: 🎉 StockMate v2.0 Released
author: Rajdeep Chatterjee
content: The new version of StockMate adds chart integration, client management, and a sleek new UI. Upgrade today!

title: 📨 Introducing: Email Finder Pro Edition
author: Rajdeep Chatterjee
content: We’ve launched a Pro version of Email Finder with advanced domain validation, bulk scan support, and export to Excel.

title: 🏢 The Story Behind SalesAutoMate™
author: Rajdeep Chatterjee
content: SalesAutoMate™ started as a vision to help businesses automate their daily operations — from quotations to document editing. Today, it serves as a growing ecosystem of tools built from real-world needs.

title: 👤 About the Founder - Rajdeep Chatterjee
author: Rajdeep Chatterjee
content: Hi, I'm Rajdeep — a developer, founder, and passionate builder of business tools. I created SalesAutoMate™ to help others save time and scale fast. You can contact me at rajdeepchatterjee@salesautomate.site.

title: 📬 How SalesAutoMate™ Email System Was Built
author: Rajdeep Chatterjee
content: I used Zoho Mail and custom routing with Vercel + Node.js to build the SalesAutoMate™ email experience. The super administrator of all mailboxes is me, and the domain used is mail.salesautomate.site.
